name: Portmenu
body:
### Portmenu.
A little script to help using Portage in [Gentoo Linux](http://www.gentoo.org/). Please note, that I did not use Gentoo in many years, so this script may be not working anymore. But feel free to fork it!

Save it in /usr/bin/portmenu and make it executable. Then you're fine to run it!

```
$ mv portmenu.sh /usr/bin/portmenu
$ chmod +x /usr/bin/portmenu
$ portmenu
```
tagline: A little script to make handling Portage in Gentoo Linux easier.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
